If you're interested in a more chilling and suspenseful film, then "You" would be a better fit. It features a powerful performance from Martin McConaughey as a troubled man who finds himself involved in a serial killer's case.

If you're looking for a film with a bit more psychological depth, then "Frailty" is a great option. It stars Matt O'Leary as a retired FBI agent who is haunted by his childhood trauma.
